about_me.des: I am an Android developer. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful. I can make lots of friends when I coding and travel.

projects.kweather: KWeather is a simple weather app on android. It show local weather, and you can select other city.

career.ctc_des: Now I am in CTC and develop android app, about BeiDou satellite communication.
career.hi-sun_des: Before I Graduated, I joined Hi-sun, I started develop android application.
career.college_des: At July 2012,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
